reviews.review: im a counter strike fanatic and always will be, this i think is the best in the series it is what created and started the demolition modes in most fps games and fps multiplayer games, there is even a freakin nexon korean mmofps of this (i play that alot), this game and game series rules if you do not own it what is wrong with you ?! its part of PC FPS history!!!
Veľmi dobrá hra. Aj keď človeka nasere že prevažuje skupina tak povediac Warez. Warez hráči používajú cheaty na servroch.Inakšie nemôžem hodnotiť inak ako 10/10 Stará dobrá klasika.
세월이 흘려도 사람들은 이 게임을 플레이한다 즉 그정도로 명작이다

Let me start off by saying this. Back when this game was new, popular and all, i would reccomend it hands down. But the fact that you cant play with bots is devastating if you are playing this game right now. So that means you will have to play on servers! But right now most of the servers are completely empty and that renders the game almost impossible to play. So i reccommend you get any of the other 3 CS games. This game is just too dead to reccomend.

Ok, I'll be honest when i first got this game i was a little uneasy but i just played it today and this game is astoundingly great for either nostalga or somebody who want a fun experiance when not haveing such a good pc so id buy it.

Aus nostalgischen Gründen mal wieder CS 1.6 installiert. Natürlich wollte ich es dann auch so wie früher und wie gewohnt spielen. Wallbangs gehören nun mal dazu. Erster Server und direkt nen Ban, weil Wallbang verboten ist. Alles klar und reingehauen. Offenbar ist die CS 1.6 Community ziemlich stark verkommen.

Danke an die guten alten Zeiten und mittlerweile auch alten Mates :D

If you didn't know, this game is the reason Steam was invented and for that reason alone I believe everyone on Steam should own this game.
Edit. I nominated this game for the Test Of Time award because no game deserves it as much as Counter-Strike.
